cab.content: This Document is the[f rsporty of Military Secret. 1466Fvoih Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,2btU February J 921.301. 24/2. No. 23.3. Waziristan. Sniping activity continues. On 18th, enemy, estimated at 30 strong, fired on the picketing troops near Chagmalai. Our casualties, one killed, five wounded.On 20th it was reported from Sorarogha that enemy Mahsuds fired on friendly Mahsuds working on the road. Picket opened fire, killing two of the enemy.All above communicated to Press.
